title: Tonto National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Lower Cliff Dwelling Advisory  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Lower Cliff Dwelling Advisory   Due to staff shortages, a park ranger may not always be present at the Lower Cliff Dwelling. Be prepared for hiking in a harsh, desert environment. Always bring with you: water, sun protection, and close-toed shoes.
